problem_text_cn: 如图是一个圆锥形型的纸杯的侧面展开图,已知圆锥底面半径为5cm,母线长为15cm,那么纸杯的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: The figure is a expanded figure of the lateral surface of a cone-shaped paper cup. It is known that the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is N_0 and the length of the generatrix is N_1. Then the lateral area of ​​the paper cup is ()
raw_answer: 解:纸杯的侧面积为π×5×15=75πcm^{2}．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查圆锥的计算；掌握圆锥侧面积的计算公式是解决本题的关键．
